PenmuxModule.Name: HttpExchange
PenmuxModule.Description: HTTP server module that enables easy file downloading to targets

Option.Name: CommandSearchPath
Option.Description: Path that contains CSV files that holds the download command definitions

Option.Name: NoConfirm
Option.Description: Start the download command after selection. When enabled you can't edit the command before running

Option.Name: UseSessionDir
Option.Description: Use session directory as base dir if set. If not set use HttpRootDirBaseDir

Option.Name: HttpRootDirBase
Option.Description: Base directory to store http. All tmux placeholders can be used (ae. #W, #S, etc.)

Option.Name: HttpRunning
Option.Description: Status to know that the server is running

Option.Name: HttpRootDir
Option.Description: Provides the final http server root directory which holds the files. Can be used by other modules to store files

Option.Name: HttpUri
Option.Description: Provides the final http server base uri. Can be used by other modules to store files

Consumes.Name: SessionDir
Consumes.Description: The final session directory. Can be used by other modules to store data.
